answerText: Hank Morgan [accept either; prompt on "The Connecticut Yankee"][10] Hank Morgan goes back in time and clashes with Merlin in this Mark Twain novel.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | RPI | 13 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This character repairs a well in the Valley of Holiness while on a quest with his future wife, Sandy. For 10 points each: [10] Name this character who earlier avoids death by predicting a solar eclipse.
